thread.title: Attorney David C. Prather Elected to Be Treasurer for the Board of Local South Florida PBS, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: Attorney David C. Prather Elected to Be Treasurer for the Board of Local South Florida PBS, Inc.

organizations.name: board of local south florida pbs, inc
board of south florida pbs, inc.
board of directors south florida pbs, inc

text:
WEST PALM BEACH, Fla., March 8, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Partner-attorney David C. Prather of Clark, Fountain, La Vista, Prather, Keen & Littky-Rubin in West Palm Beach, Florida has been elected to be the next Treasurer for the Board of Directors South Florida PBS, Inc. Known among his peers as the "Closer" for complex and high-stakes injury claims, Attorney Prather stands upon a reputation for excellence, focus, and compassion for others. He will be able to translate his legal abilities well into his role as the Treasurer for the Board.
This fantastic opportunity for Attorney Prather is made possible by the voting members of the Board of South Florida PBS, Inc., who entrust him with such an important responsibility. He is thankful and appreciative for the position and promises to dedicate his efforts to the organization and the communities it serves.
South Florida PBS, Inc. is the single-largest public media company in the State of Florida. The newscasts and television programs produced and distributed by the organization are viewed by an approximate 6.3 million viewers, extending from Sebastian to Key West. People across the country understand PBS to be a company that promotes community connections, arts and culture, creative ways to educate young children, and encourage viewer participation. As a compassionate and trusted personal injury attorney, David Prather holds many of those same principles as his own.
Parties interested in the work of South Florida PBS, Inc. can visit the organization's official website for more information: http://www.southfloridapbs.org/home/ . Inquiring parties can visit https://www.clarkfountain.com/ to learn more about Attorney David Prather and the work of the West Palm Beach personal injury lawyers of Clark, Fountain, La Vista, Prather, Keen & Littky-Rubin.
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/attorney-david-c-prather-elected-to-be-treasurer-for-the-board-of-local-south-florida-pbs-inc-300611226.html
SOURCE Clark, Fountain, La Vista, Prather, Keen & Littky-Rubin
